mapper.sql: csid, stu_number, zero_fiftynine, sixty_sixtynine, seventy_seventynine, eighty_eightynine, ninety_hundred
mapper.select: SELECT t.zero_fiftynine, t.sixty_sixtynine, t.seventy_seventynine, t.eighty_eightynine, t.ninety_hundred FROM coursescoredis t WHERE t.stu_number = #{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into coursescoredis (csid, stu_number, zero_fiftynine, sixty_sixtynine, seventy_seventynine, eighty_eightynine, ninety_hundred) values (#{csid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zeroFiftynine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sixtySixtynine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seventySeventynine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eightyEightynine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ninetyHundred,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update coursescoredis
stu_number = #{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zero_fiftynine = #{zeroFiftynine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sixty_sixtynine = #{sixtySixtynine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seventy_seventynine = #{seventySeventynine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eighty_eightynine = #{eightyEightynine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ninety_hundred = #{ninetyHundred,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where csid = #{csid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
